Name: Get selected node
Description: Can I refer the currently selected node in the DOM tree from the console?

Chrome.Notes: Use `$0` to access the currently selected node. Additionally, `$1`, `$2`, `$3`, ... will give you the last selected nodes in the reverse chronological order.
